titleStmt.title: Francis Rockley Esq; presenteth, that the revenew of the excise may be improved two hundred thousand pounds per annum (if the proceede of it be more than so much now) by the imposition of a proportionable excise in substance upon every quarter of malt, ...
titleStmt.author: Rockley, Francis.
